value.0: D20 Modern Action Menu.  What action would you like to take?
You must target yourself to make a skill check/ability check/save or to perform an emote.
What kind of check do you want to make?
Which die OR what settings change?
What would you like to do?

Move a placeable to an elevation (default is 2 meters; set with the voice command .elev plus the number - .elev 2.5, for example).
Do a wealth check on a PC.
Do a Reputation check on a PC.
Locks, traps, pockets, or escape artist.
Use Escape Artist to free yourself from entangement or similar effect.
Modern social/knowledge action (Wealth, Reputation, Identify, Craft).
Identify an item using a Knowledge skill.
Make a wealth check for DM purposes only.
Determine cost of an item (in Wealth DC).
Roll a Skill Check (Research to Tumble)
Roll a Skill Check (K - Technology to Repair)
Roll a Skill Check (K - Behavoral to K - Tactics)
Roll a Skill Check (Gamble to K - Art)
Roll a Skill Check (Craft Visual Art to Forgery)
Roll a Skill Check (Balance - Craft Structural)
<StartAction>[LOCAL]</Start> Broadcast my roll to people in my immediate vicinity.
<StartAction>[PRIVATE]</Start> Broadcast the roll only to me and the DM.
<StartAction>[GLOBAL]</Start> Broadcast my roll to everyone on the server.
Sit on the Floor and Read (if you are already sitting, you continue to sit)
Sit on the Floor and Drink (if you are already sitting, you continue to sit)
Sit on the Floor and Read (if you are already sitting, you continue to sit)
Sit on the Floor and Drink (if you are already sitting, you continue to sit)
Smoke Cigarette/Cigar (Hold item for correct effect)
Drink from Glass/Mug (Hold the item for correct effect)
Movement action (dual-wield, jump, crawl, vehicles, horses)
Drop down in saddle to take cover, or get up from cover in saddle.
Ride in the vehicle as a passenger.
Dual-wield a handgun (must match equipped one).
